entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 04:48 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
